member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionBool
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type bool..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionDateTime
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type DateTime..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionDecimal
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type Decimal..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionDouble
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type Double..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionInt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type Int32, it's either in a wrong format or out of range..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionLong
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type long, it's either in a wrong format or out of range..

member.name: P:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.App_GlobalResources.Resource.FormatExceptionShort
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value: \"{0}\" to type short, it's either in a wrong format or out of range..

member.summary: An internal class which provides an author attribute for both structs, interfaces, enums and methods.

member.summary: The default Constructor.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions
member.summary: Class which contains several boolean extension methods.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions.IsEven(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the number is odd or even.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions.HasValue(System.String)
member.summary: Determines a boolean based on if the provided string value contains a value.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions.IsFilenameSafe(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the string can be used as a filename.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions.ToBoolean(System.Int16)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value based on the MySql (short)TinyInt value.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.BooleanExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value based on the provided string value.

member.summary: Class which contains several double extension methods.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.DoubleExtensions.ToDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to a double.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.EnumExtensions
member.summary: Component class which holds the Enum extension methods.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.EnumExtensions.Description(System.Enum)
member.summary: Returns the description attribute.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.DescriptionAttributeNotImplementedException
member.summary: The internal exception that is thrown when the description attribute is not implemented, this class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the DescriptionAttributeNotImplementedException class with its default properties.

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the DescriptionAttributeNotImplementedException class with its default properties.

member.name: T:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Class which contains several string extension methods.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the provided string, but sets the first character to its uppercase equivalent.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.ToLower(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the provided string converted to lowercase. Furthermore, there is the possibility to change the first character to its uppercase equivalent.
member.param: Provide a boolean value based on whether the first characters should be its uppercase equivalent.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the provided value to the current string.
member.param: Provide the value you want to add to the current string.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.Reverse(System.String)
member.summary: Reverses the string input.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.GetNameWithoutExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file name of the specified path string without extension.

member.name: M:Rlaan.Toolkit.Extensions.StringExtensions.FormatString(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Replaces the format item in a specified string with the string representation of a corresponding object in a specified array.
member.param: An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.
